wordGroup: flatter oneself 自鸣得意；自以为是

sentences.en: I knew she was just flattering me.
sentences.cn: 我知道她只是在奉承我。

sentences.en: Most of his colleagues had positive, even flattering things to say.
sentences.cn: 他的大多数同事都有一些正面的、甚至奉承的话要说。

sentences.en: It wasn't a very flattering photograph.
sentences.cn: 这张照片照得不如本人好看。
